text: Ebam yate tini kapata bisbasi purusa o kapata bisbasini nari ebam ansibadi purusa o ansibadini nariderake sasti dena, yara allaha samparke manda dharana posana kare. Tadera jan'ya manda parinama. Allaha tadera prati krud'dha hayechena, taderake abhisapta karechena. Ebam tahadera jan'ye jahannama prastuta rekhechena. Tadera pratyabartana sthala atyanta manda.
